/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. A yellow van is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. In the distance, a large building with a red roof stands out, its traditional architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
